mappingDecisions.reason: NPS (0-10 scale) mapped to Slider with min/max config
mappingDecisions.notes: NPS is a specific use case of slider/rating scale

mappingDecisions.reason: Text input mapped to textarea (no multiline indicator, but placeholder suggests longer response)
mappingDecisions.notes: Could be 'Tx' if short single-line input preferred, but 'Ta' better for feedback

conversionNotes: Survey follows linear flow with no branching logic
All transitions are simple 'next' nodes without conditions
Option IDs (e.g., 'opt_engineering') not preserved in DSL as they're implementation details
NPS question type converted to Slider - semantically equivalent for 0-10 scale
Text question converted to Textarea for better UX with feedback responses
All likert scales use consistent 5-point scale with Strongly Disagree/Strongly Agree labels
Placeholder text preserved in config blocks where applicable
